text: That is because you took God’s signs the Qur’ān in mockery and the life of this world deceived you’ to the extent that you said ‘There is neither Resurrection nor Reckoning’. So today they will not be brought out read either active yakhrujūna ‘they will not come out’ or passive yukhrajūna ‘they will not be brought out’ of it of the Fire nor will they asked to make amends they will not be asked to try to attain the pleasure of their Lord by repenting or being obedient for such action will be of no use then.
